summary: Completed comprehensive testing of M-Dental financial management application. Backend API endpoints working correctly after fixing MongoDB ObjectId serialization issues. Frontend loads properly with professional Albanian UI, role-based access control, and navigation working correctly.

resolved_issues.issue: MongoDB ObjectId serialization error in create endpoints
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Added .copy() to insert operations and .pop('_id', None) to remove MongoDB ObjectId before returning responses

design_issues.issue: Page title not found - may be using different text than expected

passed_tests: Login page loads with Google OAuth
Admin dashboard loads with charts and statistics
Navigation to all admin pages (patients, invoices, inflows, outflows, reports, settings)
Role-based access control (staff restricted from admin pages)
